dimensions.label: Grind Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal development?

options.description: Your FarTwin will dedicate significant time and effort to improving skills, with a focus on progress over perfection.
Your FarTwin will prioritize relaxation and enjoyment over structured improvement, taking an easygoing approach to personal growth.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty and ambiguity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new experiences and challenges, embracing the unknown with a sense of adventure.
Your FarTwin will approach uncertain situations with caution, weighing risks carefully before making decisions or taking actions.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thrive in social environments, drawing energy from the company of others and enjoying lively conversations.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key settings, recharging alone before engaging with others or participating in group activities.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle challenges with a systematic, methodical approach, analyzing data and evaluating options before making decisions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creativity to solve problems, trusting their gut feelings and exploring unconventional solutions.

dimensions.label: Perfectionism
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach tasks and projects?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for precision and accuracy, ensuring that every detail is attended to before completing a task or project.
Your FarTwin will focus on meeting deadlines and delivering results, rather than getting bogged down in the intricacies of each task or project.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle changes and unexpected events?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adjust easily to new circumstances, adapting their plans and approach as needed to navigate uncertainty.
Your FarTwin will resist changes and stick to their original plan, even in the face of adversity or unexpected events.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach education and self-improvement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge of their own learning, setting goals and pursuing knowledge through independent study and exploration.
Your FarTwin will prefer a more formalized approach to education, following established curricula and seeking guidance from qualified instructors.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions in public?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions, sharing their feelings and thoughts with others without hesitation or reserve.
Your FarTwin will maintain a more stoic demeanor in public, keeping their emotions private and only revealing them to those they trust.
